## TextElement.glyphCaseArray property

 Array storing the casing (`true`<!-- -->: uppercase, `false`<!-- -->: lowercase) for this `TextElement`<!-- -->. Used by labels in \[\[TextElementsRenderer\]\] to support `SmallCaps`<!-- -->. Valid after `loadingState` is `Initialized`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
glyphCaseArray?: boolean[];
```
